amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the FDA Center for Drug Evaluation and Research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding to the Center for Drug Evaluation and Research by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
